author: nacho
msg: Translated options for debugns and optimkization to CcCompiler,
and made all cc-like depend on cCCompiler instead of CompilerAdapter

author: costin
msg: Note that the .o is generated using the same rules as javac - in a separate directory
( the buildDir attribute ), using a package structure derived from the file location.
( i.e. the file location minus base dir in <src> ). This avoids potential
name conflicts, when same name is used for .c files in different directories.
